Templates¶

THIS IS THE TEMPLATES DOCUMENTATION PAGE

details.html¶

Displays the tables that belong to each Waiter

header.html¶

Generic header display file

index.html¶

Displays all the employees

login_waiter.html¶

Displays the login page for the waiter

menu.html¶

Displays the menu categories

menuitem.html¶

Displays the menu items for each category

order_detail.html¶

Displays the items of each order and a button to make in progress or done depending on the previous state

orderplaced.html¶

Displays a success message for successfully placed order

placeorder.html¶

Displays the current order and the cost of the selected items

success.html¶

Displays a success message for the status update of an order

view_active_orders.html¶

Displays all the active orders and their items

view_in_progress_orders.html¶

Displays all the in progress orders and their items

view_done_orders.html¶

Displays all the done orders and their items
